channel.title: Al Jazeera – Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera
channel.description: Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera

image.title: Al Jazeera – Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera
image.description: Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera

item.title: As Palestine applies for full UN membership, what’s in the way?
item.description: History set to be repeated as US prepares to wield veto, insisting Palestine must negotiate statehood with Israel first.

item.title: Top European court hands Swiss women victory in landmark climate ruling
item.description: Verdict will have ripple effect in Europe and beyond, likely setting precedent for how courts deal with climate cases.

item.title: Bodies recovered from Gaza’s Shifa hospital after Israeli assault
item.description: Palestinians have been recovering bodies and remains of people killed at Gaza’s al-Shifa hospital.

item.title: Israel’s war on Gaza: List of key events, day 186
item.description: PM Netanyahu says a date has been set for a ground offensive in Rafah after troops withdraw from nearby Khan Younis.

item.title: Israel’s war is depriving Gaza’s students of an education
item.description: Dentistry student Tasneem Ahel fled north Gaza in the hope of making it overseas to complete her education.

item.title: Cameron meets Trump, to urge US Congress to approve Ukraine military aid
item.description: Top British diplomat says success for Ukraine is vital for the security of the United States and Europe.

item.title: Turkey restricts exports of 54 products to Israel until Gaza ceasefire
item.description: Trade Ministry says decision to remain in place until Israel stops attacks and allows adequate aid into Gaza.

item.title: Jadeja reaches IPL cricket milestone in Chennai’s win over Kolkata
item.description: The veteran Indian all-rounder's unique statistical feat coincided with Chennai snapping a two-match IPL losing streak.

item.title: Greek valley that became a lake stirs drought debate
item.description: Drained in 1962 and restored again to wetlands in 2018, Lake Karla is now triple its normal size.

item.title: Ecuador ex-VP Jorge Glas hospitalised after capture from Mexico embassy
item.description: Ecuador has said it wishes to resolve differences with Mexico, but has defended its raid on embassy.

item.title: Russia and China to deepen security cooperation in Asia, Europe
item.description: Russian foreign minister visits Beijing and also receives assurances of strengthened economic cooperation from China.

item.title: Al Nassr’s Ronaldo red-carded as Al Hilal win Saudi Super Cup semifinal
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's wait for a Saudi Arabian football trophy will continue after Super Cup exit.

item.title: ‘Not your typical Ramadan’: Muslim Americans focus on Gaza in holy month
item.description: Muslim Americans have rebuffed some politicians, held fundraisers and scaled back festivities to show support for Gaza.

item.title: Israel says ‘date set’ for Rafah invasion amid ongoing Gaza ceasefire talks
item.description: Hamas says Israel is not acceding to demands of a military withdrawal and allowing Palestinians to return home.

item.title: Total solar eclipse sweeps across North America: Eight highlights
item.description: The path of totality crossed several major cities including Dallas, Indianapolis, Cleveland, Buffalo and Montreal.

item.title: Activists calling for Israel arms embargo paint UK Labour Party office red
item.description: Activists spray red paint on the UK’s Labour Party headquarters in a protest calling for an arms embargo against Israel.

item.title: From unfair trade to TikTok: US Treasury Secretary Yellen’s China trip
item.description: US-China talks come amid Biden administration's complaints that Beijing is unfairly subsidising Chinese industries.

item.title: ‘On borrowed time’: World marks new global heat record in March
item.description: European climate agency says ocean surface temperature also reached new record raising risk of extreme weather.

item.title: Why a Sri Lankan island is sparking an Indian election controversy
item.description: PM Modi claims former Congress government sneakily gifted Katchatheevu island to Sri Lanka. But the truth is complex.

item.title: Tesla settles lawsuit over Autopilot crash that killed Apple engineer
item.description: The settlement avoids a jury trial months ahead of Tesla's scheduled release of a self-driving taxi.

item.title: Biden unveils $6.6bn for Taiwan’s TSMC to ramp up US chip production
item.description: Taiwanese chip giant will build third facility in Arizona as part of $65bn investment in the US.

item.title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 775
item.description: As the war enters its 775th day, these are the main developments.

item.title: ‘Accepted in both [worlds]’: Indonesia’s Chinese Muslims prepare for Eid
item.description: Many Chinese become Muslim through marriage to Indonesian Muslims but hold onto their traditions.

item.title: Indigenous people in Philippines’s north ‘ready to fight’ as tensions rise
item.description: The remote island of Itbayat is in the eye of any conflict with China and its residents are preparing themselves.

item.title: In Indonesia and Malaysia, beauty is big business during Eid al-Fitr
item.description: Cosmetics brands in Southeast Asia look to cash in on Ramadan period shopping boom.
